algorithm_technique: Iterate through string, replace non-digits with spaces, parse numbers, store unique numbers in a set.
problem_summary_simple: Count how many unique integers are in a string after replacing letters with spaces.
problem_summary_technical: Process string, replacing non-digits with spaces, then extract and count unique integers using a set.
key_insights: Using a set automatically handles uniqueness and ignores leading zeros implicitly when storing integers.
Iterating one past the end of the string simplifies handling the last number.
The problem requires careful parsing of numbers, especially handling consecutive digits and the end of the string.
